inputs.name: fs_type
inputs.description: Type of file system to be mounted (e.g., nfs, lustre)

inputs.name: local_mount
inputs.description: The mount point where the contents of the device may be accessed after mounting.

inputs.name: mount_options
inputs.description: Options describing various aspects of the file system.

inputs.name: remote_mount
inputs.description: Remote FS name or export (exported directory for nfs, fs name for lustre)

inputs.name: server_ip
inputs.description: The device name as supplied to fs-tab, excluding remote fs-name(for nfs, that is the server IP, for lustre <MGS NID>[:<MGS NID>]).

outputs.name: network_storage
outputs.description: Describes a remote network storage to be mounted by fs-tab.
